resources.string: Ukraine is a country, situated in the centre of Europe. It has a long history, beautiful landscapes, interesting traditions and rich culture.

KEEP YOUR SCORE HIGH! 


It does NOT guarantee your safety! 

Wash your hands often, avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth.
 Use alcohol-based disinfectant liquids / gels (min. 60%).
 Touching eyes, nose or mouth with contaminated hands can transfer the virus from surfaces.
THE TEXT FOR ADVICE WHILE ILLNESS RATE UNDER 700 BUT MORE THAN 300 WILL BE HERE
THE TEXT FOR ADVICE WHILE ILLNESS RATE UNDER 200 WILL BE HERE
You should show this QR Code to a guard in a shop nearby
